full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN BSRUNG SPRUL PA'I CHOS RGYAL CHEN MOR STABS GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'DOD DGU MCHOG SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES BSTAN BSRUNG SPRUL PA'I CHOS RGYAL CHEN MOR GSHEGS GTOR SKYOD TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BSGRIGS DGOS ZHES SPYI SO CHEN MO'I SDE BA CHE MKHYEN YANGS GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN 'DZIN, SDE PA CHUD PA MKHYEN YANGS GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN, DGE RGAN MKHYEN YANGS KHONG NGAG DBANG BSTAN SKYOD RNAMS KYIS LHA RDZAS MDZOD BTAGS DNGUL GYI MAndAL SOGS KYI SKYES GYA NOM PA DANG BSKUL BA'I DON LTAR, GSER TOG MKHAN PO SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BZHIN SBYAR BA'O, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO,
